title: Google Lifts Veil, a Little, Into Secretive Search Algorithm Changes
text:
MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif.—Google rarely talks about its secretive search algorithm. This week, the tech giant took a stab toward transparency, unveiling changes that it says will surface more accurate and intelligent responses to hundreds of millions of queries a day.

Top Google executives, in a media briefing Thursday, said they had harnessed advanced machine learning and mathematical modeling to produce better answers to complex search queries and questions that often confound its current algorithm. They summed up the changes...
description: Google rarely talks about its search algorithm. However, the tech giant has unveiled changes that it says will surface more accurate responses to hundreds of millions of queries a day.
